document_data.caption: A map showing Buzzard Beak Harbor on the Easting Reach.
document_data.name: Buzzard Beak Harbor
document_data.mainbody: '''Buzzard Beak Harbor''' was a small bay found off the [[Easting Reach]] in [[northeast Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Geography: Part of the harbor was in [[Damara]] and the other part was in [[Impiltur]]. The natural harbor was treacherous to shipping due to the many reefs and high concentration of weeds, but it was a popular destination with smugglers and pirates.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Rilaunyr's Warship]] was known to patrol the area.
